title: DDI study schema
description: JSON-schema representing an study in the DDI model. Process to acquire data on a sample and attempt to draw conclusions about the population the sample has been selected from, executing a plan and design.

schedulesActivity.description: a property used to specify the activities scheduled by the study

schedulesDataAcquisition.description: a property used to specific the kind of techniques and response variables used during a study for acquiring signal

type.description: a property used to specify the type of study, e.g. intervention or observation or meta-analysis

hasStudyGroup.description: a property used to list the different study groups associated with a study

recruits.description: a property used to specify which materials are the subjects and participants of the study

usesReagent.description: a property used to specify which materials are used as reagents (but not subjects) of the study

isAboutBiologicalProcess.description: a property used to specify the biological processes relevant to the study (ideally from a controlled vocabulary/ontology)

resultsIn.description: a property used to specify the collection of data during assays over the course of a study
